Title: Scruffs Black Trade Flex Trousers 36R
Description: Flexible, hardwearing and practical, these Scruffs Trade Flex trousers in 36R are made of a high-tech fabric designed to stand up to challenging working conditions. Easy to wear all day long, these smart black trousers help you to look smartly professional in front of clients while keeping you warm, comfortable and dry whatever the work day throws at you.
category: Trade Essentials/PPE and Workwear/Trousers/Trousers.csv -> Scruffs Black Trade Flex Trousers 36R
Material: 48% recycled polyester, 26% sustainably sourced cotton, 26% elastomultiester
Resistance Features: Abrasion resistant top-loading CORDURA® knee pockets for enhanced durability
Feature 1: Scruffs workwear includes trousers, baselayers, jackets and tops. It’s made from durable, high performance materials.
